alert.note: Alert for Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 23 at 3:30AM EDT until April 24 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT EDT /11 PM CDT/ TONIGHT TO 8 AM EDT /7 AM CDT/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 degrees expected. Areas closer to Lake Michigan may see slightly warmer temperatures. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...From midnight EDT /11 PM CDT/ tonight to 8 AM EDT /7 AM CDT/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph
